item.title: UCIe 2.0 Interconnect Technology Deep Dive: Enabling Heterogeneous Integration
item.author: xxxx
item.description: Comprehensive technical analysis of UCIe 2.0 interconnect technology, its architecture, performance characteristics, and implications for chiplet-based system design.
